Item.sqlserver_body: CREATE FUNCTION EvaluatePermissionItemClassification ( @type VARCHAR(32), @xclass_id CHAR(32), @identity_list VARCHAR(MAX), @item_type_id CHAR(32) ) RETURNS TABLE AS RETURN ( SELECT MAX (CASE WHEN ( acs.can_classify = '1' AND @type = 'can_classify' ) THEN 9 -- can_update permissions only WHEN ( acs.can_unclassify = '1' AND @type = 'can_unclassify' ) THEN 9 -- can_delete permissions only WHEN ( acs.can_get_isclassified = '1' AND @type = 'can_get_isclassified' ) THEN 9 -- can_change_access permissions only ELSE 0 -- No permissions on specified for specified access right END) p FROM (SELECT acs.can_classify, acs.can_unclassify, acs.can_get_isclassified from [innovator].[XCLASS_CLASSIFICATION_PERM] xclass_perm INNER JOIN [Access_ItemClassification] acs ON acs.SOURCE_ID = xclass_perm.RELATED_ID WHERE xclass_perm.SOURCE_ID = @xclass_id AND xclass_perm.ITEMTYPE_ID = @item_type_id AND (CHARINDEX(acs.[related_id] COLLATE Latin1_General_BIN2, @identity_list) > 0) ) acs )
Item.name: EvaluatePermissionItemClassification
